name: CURA
description:
Features of this game

◇many gimmicks◇

Numerous devices obstruct the path to the goal. Can you roll your brain while rolling CURA, solve all the mysteries and clear the stage?

◆many stages◆

There are over 70 stages that Cura can roll on. Roll around as much as you like!

◇many elements◇

Can you clear the shortest steps devised by the developers? Aim for the highest rating on all stages!
